column4: if you install two video cards but are only using one monitor, will it improve your video quality in any way?
most likely no. unless you are using 'sli'  enabled video cards.
how would it help sli cards?
the point of 'sli' is  to allow multi video cards to share the rendering load. thus having sli video cards working together will double your rendering  power. (not quite, but it does give it a boost)
